item.title: Eye Candy
item.description: - The post features a compilation of different creative techniques used in animation such as Lens Wipe, POV, Low-Angle, Dolly Zoom, Scribble Animation, Stable Diffusion, Match Cut, and tilt.

item.title: Film studios lose bid to unmask Reddit users who wrote comments on piracy
item.description: - A judge in the US District Court for the Northern District of California has ruled in favor of Reddit, stating that it does not have to identify eight anonymous users who wrote comments in piracy-related threads.

item.title: Mojo â€“ a new programming language for AI developers
item.description: - Mojo is a new programming language designed specifically for artificial intelligence (AI) developers, with features that streamline the AI development process and make it easier to read and write code.

item.title: Fakespot Is Acquired by Mozilla
item.description: - This website is best experienced by visiting the website directly.

item.title: The Linux Kernel Module Programming Guide
item.description: - The Linux Kernel Module Programming Guide is a free book that teaches readers how to write kernel modules, which extend the functionality of the kernel without needing to reboot the system.

item.title: Microsoft broke a Chrome feature to promote Edge
item.description: - Microsoft issued a Windows update that broke a Chrome feature, making it harder to change your default browser and annoying Chrome users with popups, Gizmodo has learned.

item.title: PornHub blocks users in Utah, cites state's age verification law
item.description: - PornHub has implemented a block on users in Utah who wish to access their site due to the state's new age verification law.

item.title: Let's make sure GitHub doesn't become the only option
item.description: - GitHub's dominant position in software development creates a risk to the industry, as it gives one company too much control and limits the use of alternative tools.

item.title: faulTPM: Exposing AMD fTPMs' Deepest Secrets
item.description: - Researchers at the Fraunhofer Institute discovered a vulnerability in AMD's fTPM (firmware-based TPM) which they named faulTPM.

item.title: Jsonformer: Generate structured output from LLMs
item.description: - Jsonformer is a new approach to generate structured JSON from language models to ensure that the generated JSON is always syntactically correct and conforms to the specified schema.
